definitions.definition: having three parts of the same type, or happening three times:
examples: Her trainer is a triple Olympic champion.

definitions.definition: three times as large as something:
examples: The number of one-parent households reached 10.1 million in 2011, nearly triple that of 1981.

definitions.definition: to increase three times in size or amount, or to make something do this:
examples: We have tripled our output over the past two years.
